body.p: l'avis que Vous me demandez au sujet de la campagne prochaine; elle sera défensive, guerre de postes, et un peu plus ennuyeuse encore que celle de l'année passée; c'est pourquoi je ne puis en conscience Vous conseiller autrement, qu'au lieu d'exciter des pleurs et des regrets amers, de partager au sein de Votre chère et charmante famillePaul's wife, Mariya Fedorovna, and his many children, Alexander, Konstantin, Aleksandra, Elena, Mariya, and Ekaterina. la joie des succès dont il plaira au Tout-Puissant, comme j'ose l'espérer, de bénir la justice de notre cause.

closer.signed: Adieu! je Vous embrasse de tout mon coeur et suis très-sensible à vos procédés.

body.p: Here, my dear son, is my opinion, which you requested as regards the impending campaign. It will be defensive, a war of postsThis phrase, meaning a war of attrition, was used by George Washington for the strategy of the American Revolutionaries (see http://www.loc.gov/teachers/classroommaterials/presentationsandactivities/presentations/timeline/amrev/north/posts.html)., and a bit more boring still than last year's. That is why I cannot in good conscience give you any other advice than that, rather than causing tears and bitter regrets, you share with your dear and charming family our joy at the successes with which I dare to hope the Almighty will be pleased to bless the justice of our cause.

closer.signed: Farewell! I embrace you with all my heart and very much appreciate your actions.
